other_tests.findings: Large patent ductus arteriosus, mild pericardial effusion, severe left ventricular hypertrophy, moderate-to-severe subaortic stenosis, normal aortic valve, presence of a subaortic membrane.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up echocardiogram showed moderate LVH, a peak pressure gradient of 51 mm Hg, and a mean pressure gradient of 32 mm Hg.

other_tests.findings: Fibromuscular tissue fragments exhibiting secondary regenerative changes on a myxoid background.
Presence of a subaortic membrane, moderate aortic stenosis, and moderate LVH; LVOT pressure gradient was 90 mm Hg and mean pressure gradient was 55 mm Hg.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative echocardiography showed moderate aortic valvular stenosis and a peak pressure gradient of 72 mm Hg.

other_tests.findings: Fibromuscular tissue showing spindle-shaped cells with abundant intercellular connective tissue stroma.
